page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Delete row dialog title
page.description: The title for the confirmation message box that appears when the user deletes a dirty row in a repeating section.
page.discussion: Specify the title for the confirmation message box that appears when the user deletes a dirty row in the repeating section. The *[ui:Delete row dialog title]* property supports language tags (<a5:r>...</a5:r>.)
